title: News: At The Drive-In Reform
content:
After murmurings for a number of months now, it appears that Texas rock group At The Drive-In have finally broken their silence and announced their reformation as a band.

In a message on what claims to be the bands official twitter, they state: ‘¡ ATTENTION ! To whom it may concern: AT THE DRIVE-IN will be breaking their 11 year silence THIS STATION IS …NOW…OPERATIONAL’ A similar message is also repeated on their official website.

I’d imagine that a host of festival appearances will be on the cards, including Leeds/Reading and Coachella, and I’m sure that the five piece will no doubt be welcomed back with open arms.
